mapper.insert: insert into plate_user (c_userid, c_loginname, c_username, c_sex, c_password, c_rydj, c_rylb, c_ryzt, c_ryxz, c_zcfs, c_zjlx, c_zjhm, c_jtzz, c_phone, c_wxhm, c_qq, c_email, c_bz, c_zt, c_cjuser, d_cjsj, c_xguser, d_xgsj) values (#{cUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cLoginname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cRydj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cRylb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cRyzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cRyxz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cZcfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cZjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cZjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cJtzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cWxhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cQq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cBz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cZt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCjuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dCjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cXguser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dXgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select c_userid, c_loginname, c_username, c_sex, c_password, c_rydj, c_rylb, c_ryzt, c_ryxz, c_zcfs, c_zjlx, c_zjhm, c_jtzz, c_phone, c_wxhm, c_qq, c_email, c_bz, c_zt, c_cjuser, d_cjsj, c_xguser, d_xgsj from plate_user where c_userid = #{cUserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
